meanings.sent1: I bought new boots from the bootery.
meanings.sent2: The bootery had a wide selection of winter boots.
meanings.sent3: The bootery owner joked that their boots could make anyone walk like a pro.
meanings.sent4: Her closet was a bootery, filled with boots of all colors and styles.
meanings.sent5: The bootery's sign proudly displayed 'Boots for Every Occasion'.

meanings.definition: The business of making or selling boots.
meanings.sent1: His family has been in the bootery business for generations.
meanings.sent2: She studied the art of bootery to start her own business.
meanings.sent3: The bootery business was booming after the latest fashion trend.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, bootery plays a crucial role.
meanings.sent5: The craftsmanship of their bootery was unmatched in the market.
